title: Apocalypse Now
description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Alien
description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has just begun.

title: Kramer vs. Kramer
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A just-divorced man must learn to care for his son on his own, and then must fight in court to keep custody of him when his ex-wife resurfaces.

title: All That Jazz
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation or Best Adaptation Score
description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

title: Mad Max
description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

title: Stalker
description: A guide leads two clients into a mysterious, restricted area known as the Zone, where a room is said to grant wishes.

title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
description: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, a young man spends his life being mistaken for the Messiah.

title: The Muppet Movie
description: Kermit the Frog and his new found friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog-legs restaurateur is after Kermit.

title: The Jerk
description: A simpleton raised by a black family discovers that he's not black and sets out on a series of misadventures.

title: Breaking Away
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Four working-class teenagers in a small Indiana town come to terms with life after high school.

title: Being There
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A simple-minded gardener whose only knowledge of the world comes from television is mistaken for a brilliant political pundit.

title: The China Syndrome
description: A reporter and her cameraman witness a near-meltdown at a nuclear power plant and must fight to expose the truth.

title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
description: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

title: The Black Stallion
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Sound Editing
description: A young boy befriends a wild Arabian stallion that is shipwrecked on a deserted island with him.

title: Norma Rae
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill, despite the risks involved.

title: The Warriors
description: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

title: Escape from Alcatraz
description: The true story of three inmates who attempt a daring escape from the infamous prison.

title: Nosferatu the Vampyre
description: A stylish and atmospheric remake of the classic silent horror film.

title: The Amityville Horror
description: Newlyweds and their three children move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living in or visiting the house.

title: Rocky II
description: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

title: The Tin Drum
description: A young boy in 1920s Danzig decides to stop growing at the age of three and communicates with the world through his tin drum.

title: The In-Laws
description: A mild-mannered dentist is drawn into the world of international espionage by his daughter's fiancé's father.

title: The Rose
description: The story of a self-destructive rock star who is on a downward spiral.

title: The Black Hole
description: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, hovering over a black hole.

title: Time After Time
description: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial killer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.
A successful, middle-aged Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a beautiful young woman.

title: The Champ
description: A former boxer, now a horse trainer, is talked into a comeback fight by his adoring son.

title: The Electric Horseman
description: A former rodeo star is hired to be the spokesman for a breakfast cereal, but he runs off with the company's prize horse.

title: Meatballs
description: A group of counselors and campers at a low-budget summer camp have a series of misadventures.

title: Starting Over
description: A divorced man tries to start a new life and finds himself in a new relationship, but his ex-wife keeps reappearing.

title: ...And Justice for All.
description: An idealistic lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, and he finds himself in a moral crisis.

title: The Seduction of Joe Tynan
description: A liberal U.S. Senator's life is thrown into turmoil when he has an affair with a civil rights activist.

title: The Brood
description: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, while a series of brutal attacks follow in their wake.

title: Wise Blood
description: A discharged serviceman in the American South starts his own church without God.

title: North Dallas Forty
description: A semi-fictionalized account of life in the world of professional football.

title: Phantasm
description: A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber known only as the Tall Man, who keeps a mysterious arsenal of terrible weapons with him.

title: Escape to Athena
description: During World War II, a group of Allied prisoners of war on a Greek island plan to escape and steal a treasure from a monastery.

title: Real Life
description: A pushy, narcissistic filmmaker persuades a normal family to let him and his crew film their everyday lives, but the presence of the cameras has a disruptive effect.

title: Quadrophenia
description: A young working-class mod in 1960s London finds an escape from his dead-end life in the world of music, fashion, and gang violence.

title: Rock 'n' Roll High School
description: A group of high school students, with the help of the Ramones, rebel against their oppressive principal.

title: Moonraker
production_studio: Eon Productions, Les Productions Artistes Associés
description: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

title: The Wanderers
description: The story of a gang of Italian-American teenagers in the Bronx in 1963.

title: The Driller Killer
description: An artist slowly goes insane while struggling to pay his bills, work on his masterpiece, and survive in New York City.
